title: FPS problem
body:
Hello playing LoL i have 30-50fps on very low, i think i should have at least 60fps..What i have to do to increase my fps?
 My laptop stats:
AMD A8-7100 1.80ghz
R5 graphics
8GB ram

replies.body: Sometimes your PC (you have a nice one btw) may need a little tune up to run smoothly and back in full force.  Usually things like updating drivers will bring it back to tip-top shape!  Check out the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to help out with that.  Let me know if you have any questions.
I have one problem, when i updated my  Windows 8.1 to Windows 10, and after updating graphic drivers in Windows 10 my screen starts flickering. Should i back to Windows 8.1?
It sounds like your drivers are failing, and may need to get them all up to date for your new version of OS.  The guide provided should help with that!
